local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above it, lower until contact with 10N threshold, then verify contact.
coherence_with_global: Implements the place-phase micro-goal using the same parameters as GLOBAL_BT: ensure red_plate visibility, move above, execute LowerUntilContact (slow, max_depth 0.05, force_threshold 10, timeout 1200), then verify contact.
